attributes.action: Allow vaccinated passengers to travel to the U.K. without having to quarantine
attributes.additional_details:
The traffic light system assesses the covid risk of countries but doesn’t take into account vaccinated individuals. 
Most of Europe is now allowing quarantine free travel for anyone who is vaccinated, regardless of their port of origin. The travel industry is in chaos and needs support. It is the only way to recover the industry. It also gives an incentive to get the vaccine. 

We want quarintine free travel (like the green destinations) for anyone who has been fully vaccinated against covid 19
attributes.background: We want the government to allow fully vaccinated passengers to travel to the U.K. without having to quarantine regardless of their port of origin (Like green destinations are able to do)
